combined_opener.generated_opener: Hey there! Just a quick heads-up: your Amazon package was delivered a little while ago, and rain is expected this afternoon, so you might want to grab an umbrella if you're heading out. Also, don’t forget about your team standup in 30 minutes, and your mom called while you were away, so you might want to give her a call back. By the way, your Spotify Wrapped is ready to check out! How can I assist you today?
